channel.title: Dragon HELP!
channel.description: I made my own dragon claws but they keep special and i followed a topic about it but whats wrong plz need help.. Repp++

item.title: Dragon HELP!
item.dc:creator: @davidi2 Davidi2
item.description:
@davidi2 wrote:

For this one:

if(playerEquipment[playerWeapon] == 8002 && specialAmount > 49){
specialAtkNPC(true, 75, 282, 6000);
DCdown = 4;
DCDamg = true;
npcDamage(8);
}

You need to add:

specialAmount -= 50;

You had it in the other one but not in that one.

Read full topic

item.title: Dragon HELP!
item.dc:creator: @k0isk0 k0isk0
item.description:
@k0isk0 wrote:

This is what i added

To the client.java

if(playerEquipment[playerWeapon] == 8002 && specialAmount > 49){
specialAtk(true, 75, 282, 6000);
specialAmount -= 50;
dclaws = 3;
getHit(65);
usingSpecial = true;
}

if(playerEquipment[playerWeapon] == 8002 && specialAmount > 49){
specialAtkNPC(true, 75, 282, 6000);
DCdown = 4;
DCDamg = true;
npcDamage(8);
}

Add the special.java

public class special {
public void loginSpec(client c, int item) {
switch(item) {
case 8002:
c.l33thax(12323);
c.l33thax(7574);
c.l33thax(7599);
c.l33thax(7549);
c.l33thax(8493);
c.l33thax(7499);
break;
public void needSpecial(client c, int item, int target) {
if(target != 3) {
return;
}
switch(item) {
case 8002:
c.l33thax(12323);
c.l33thax(7574);
c.l33thax(7599);
c.l33thax(7549);
c.l33thax(8493);
c.l33thax(7499);
break;

Thats all i added

Read full topic

“keep special and i followed ?” please use google translate and edit the topic and when I’m able to read it , I help[/quote]
